mapper.update: update PT_TaskSaleInvoice set VehicleID_Jump=#{pumpVehicle}, NumberOfSignings = #{numberOfSignings}, SigningTime = #{signingTime}, ReceiptMan = #{receiptPeople}, SaleFileImage = #{sign}, updownmark=0, upStatus=1 where ID = #{invoiceId}

update PT_TaskSaleInvoice set NumberOfSignings=#{numberOfSignings}, SigningTime = #{signingTime}, SaleFileImage = #{saleFileImage}, updownmark=0, upStatus=1 where ID = #{invoiceId} and compid = #{compid}
update PT_TaskSaleInvoice set SigningTime = #{signingTime}, NumberOfSignings = #{numberOfSignings}, updownmark=0, upStatus=1 where ID = #{invoiceId} and compid = #{compid}
mapper.select:
select PersonalCode, PersonalName from VM_PersonalInfo where RecStatus = 1 and compid = #{compid}
and PersonalName like '%' + #{driverName} + '%'

select tsi.ID, uc.longname as companyName, ps4.PI_TypeName InvoiceTypeName, tsi.VehicleID, tsi.NumberOfSignings as numberOfSignings, e.EPPName, e.EppCode, b.BuilderName, Placing, e.shortname, tsi.PersonalCode, vm.PersonalName, tsi.Distance, us.empname, SendTime, ds.StirName as stirId, ps.PI_TypeName placeTypeName, VehicleID_Jump jumpVehicleID, (tsi.SaleNum - ReturnNum - RemnantNum - tsi.ScrapNum) SaleNum, ThreeProduceNum, tp.StgId, StoneDia, Slump, ps3.PI_TypeName StoneAsk, ps2.PI_TypeName CementVName, Leave_STTime leaveTime, Arrive_STTime arriveTime, tsi.TaWeight, tsi.GrWeight, tsi.NetWeight, tsi.VehiceNumber, tp.TaskId, tsi.Distance, upStatus, ProduceNum, SaleFileImage from PT_TaskSaleInvoice tsi left join PT_TaskPlan tp on tsi.compid = tp.compid and tsi.TaskId = tp.TaskId left join DD_PublicInfo ps on ps.PI_Class = 24 and ps.PI_Values = tp.PlaceStyle and tsi.compid = ps.compid left join SM_EPPInfo e on tp.EPPCode = e.EPPCode and e.compid = tsi.compid left join SM_BuilderInfo b on tp.BuilderCode = b.BuilderCode and b.compid = tsi.compid left join User_employee us on tsi.compid = us.compid and tsi.OpId = us.OpId left join VM_PersonalInfo vm on tsi.PersonalCode = vm.PersonalCode and tsi.compid = vm.compid left join DD_PublicInfo ps2 on tp.CementVariety = ps2.PI_Values and ps2.PI_Class = '32' and tsi.compid = ps2.compid left join DD_PublicInfo ps3 on tp.StoneAsk = ps3.PI_Values and ps3.PI_Class = '31' and tsi.compid = ps3.compid left join DD_PublicInfo ps4 on tsi.compid = ps4.compid and tsi.InvoiceType = ps4.PI_Values and ps4.PI_Class = '51' left join DD_StirInfoSet ds on tsi.compid = ds.compid and tsi.StirId = ds.StirId left join User_comp uc on tsi.compid = uc.compid where tsi.compid = #{compid} and tsi.id = #{invoiceId}

select top 1 tsi.ID as id, tsi.compid as compid, Leave_STTime as leaveTime, vm.VehicleStatus as vehicleStatus, VehicleID as vehicleID from PT_TaskSaleInvoice tsi left join VM_VehicelManagement vm on tsi.compid = vm.compid and tsi.VehicleID = vm.CarID where tsi.compid = #{compid} and tsi.PersonalCode = #{driverCode} order by Leave_STTime desc

update DM_DriverWorkTime set begin_time=#{workTime} where compid=#{compid} and driver_code=#{driverCode} and date_time=#{dateTime}and cardNumber =#{cardNumber}
